prompt_formula.example: Slow dolly-in toward character, female warrior in tactical suit, looking determined, dark ship interior, Hollywood realism with Hero Glow lighting

close_up.prompt: tight close-up, 50mm lens, character's expression fills frame

medium_shot.prompt: medium shot, character positioned on frame-left third

full_shot.emotion: Character as physical agent within space
full_shot.prompt: full-body shot, character standing alone in cavernous warehouse

wide_shot.prompt: wide shot from 100mm telephoto, character tiny against landscape

extreme_wide.prompt: vast aerial view, cinematic 2.39:1 anamorphic aspect ratio

static.motivation: Scene requires viewer to absorb composition
static.prompt: static camera from fixed position, no movement

dolly_in.motivation: Building tension or intimacy; gradual realization
dolly_in.prompt: slow dolly-in toward character's face, subtle emphasis of emotion

dolly_out.prompt: dolly-out revealing character alone in vast space

pan.motivation: Following action or discovering narrative info
pan.prompt: slow pan-left revealing the destruction behind the character

tilt.motivation: Reveal of threat above or safety below
tilt.prompt: tilt-down from threatening sky to vulnerable character

tracking.motivation: Narrative immediacy; we are present cinema
tracking.prompt: tracking shot following character through corridor, fluid motion

handheld.prompt: handheld camera, slight shake, POV intimacy, urgent pace

orbit.prompt: camera arcs around seated character, slow 180Â° orbit

crane.motivation: Establishing environmental context or climactic shift
crane.prompt: crane shot rising from interior scene to reveal exterior landscape

dolly_zoom.motivation: Moment of revelation or psychological break
dolly_zoom.prompt: push-in while zooming-out, maintaining character size while background distorts

rule_of_thirds.description: Place subjects on intersecting lines for natural visual harmony
rule_of_thirds.prompt_harmony: subject positioned on rule-of-thirds intersection, balanced composition
rule_of_thirds.prompt_vulnerable: character pushed toward frame-left edge, isolated by negative space
rule_of_thirds.prompt_claustrophobic: character centered in frame, symmetrical composition that feels confining

shallow.prompt: shallow depth of field, background bokeh-blurred, soft focus on character's face

medium.prompt: medium depth of field, character sharp, background slightly diffused

deep.prompt: deep depth of field, entire space in sharp focus, environment as co-character

character_consistency: Generate reference image for each character using image-to-image AI
Feed reference as 'first frame' or 'style reference'
Embed character description in every prompt
Repeat exact character descriptors in every prompt
lighting_consistency: Maintain consistent lighting philosophy across acts
Use identical color temperature keywords across scenes
If Act I uses warm practical light, continue into Act II unless psychological shift
version_control: Select strongest version, refine prompt, regenerate if necessary
